name: Fridgements
description:
Fridgements

An interactive poem that combines random fragments based on your actions. 

Make sure that you have a full view of the game window; zoom out your browser view if needed. Fullscreen is not recommended. 

If there are any bugs or typos, please comment below!

Controls
  • Move your mouse to click highlighted objects and buttons
  • Press escape to pause
!!!Caution!!! If you are sensitive to quickly repeating sounds (e.g. fast clicking), please turn OFF your sound.
